resources.string: Block 1: Small Talk & Getting to Know Each Other
Learn to start conversations easily, keep them going, and connect with new people
Build confidence when talking about yourself, your interests, thoughts, and feelings
Learn to stay confident in groups, keep the conversation flowing, and find your voice in any crowd
Practice expressing your opinion politely and backing it up with solid arguments
Train your ability to sense others’ emotions and offer warm, caring verbal support
Learn to tell engaging stories, capture attention, and speak expressively
Learn to be witty, playful, and emotionally engaging — from casual flirting to making people laugh
Block completed! Come back to the exercises anytime to refresh your skill — or move on!
Complete 3 tasks from this block — earn a star and become even more confident in making new connections and conversations!
Complete 3 tasks from this block — earn a star and become even more confident talking about yourself, your feelings, and interests!
Complete 3 tasks from this block — earn a star and become even more confident in group conversations!
Complete 3 tasks from this block — earn a star and become even more confident in arguing your point and expressing polite disagreement!
Complete 3 tasks from this block — earn a star and become even more confident in emotional awareness and supporting others!
Complete 3 tasks from this block — earn a star and become even more confident in storytelling and expressive speech!
Complete 3 tasks from this block — earn a star and become even more confident in flirting, wit, and playful communication!
Speaking confidently is a skill — and you’ll build it here 👇
🗣️ Speaking course — helps you speak confidently in real-life situations
🎮 Language games — boost your creativity, humor, improvisation, and clarity
🎯 Daily challenges — quick tasks that build your speaking habit
📚 Clear program — guides you step by step from tension to fluent speech
📈 Visible progress — unlock new levels, topics, and real conversation scenarios
